title: What to Watch This Week: 50+ Premieres, Finales and More
description: To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025. This week, you’ll find 10 series premieres (including The Hunting Wives and Washington Black), a […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
excerpt: Happy Gilmore 2, The Hunting Wives, South Park, Washington Black and more! Find out what's new, returning and leaving the small screen this week.
text: To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025. This week, you’ll find 10 series premieres (including The Hunting Wives and Washington Black), a dozen returning series (including Acapulco and South Park) and a dozen finales (including Patience and Stick). Want scoop on any of the following shows? Email us and your question may be answered in Matt’s Inside Line. SUNDAY, JULY 20 🦈 8 pm Dancing With Sharks (Discovery Channel special)Five divers compete to put together an amazing underwater routine with their toothy partners; Tom Bergeron hosts. 📺 8 pm Patience Season 1 finale (PBS) 🦈 9 pm Air Jaws: The Hunt for Colossus (Discovery Channel special)A 20-foot great white breaches in New Zealand, sparking a hunt for Colossus – the legendary flying shark who went missing 10 years ago from South Africa’s waters.  🦈 10 pm Great White Assassins (Discovery Channel special)Shark expert Alison Towner teams up with Shark Week legend Dickie Chivell to decode how killer whales take down great whites with ease.  MONDAY, JULY 21 📺 The Hunting Wives (Netflix, eight-episode binge)An East Coast transplant (Brittany Snow) is charmed by an East Texas socialite (Malin Åkerman), and soon finds her life consumed by obsession, seduction and murder; Chrissy Metz, Katie Lowes and Dermot Mulroney co-star. 📺 Justice on Trial (Prime Video, eight-episode binge)Judge Judy Sheindlin puts the justice system on trial, and shows how the daily lives of 340 million Americans are impacted by the verdicts in the eight landmark cases. 📺 Trophy Wife: Murder on Safari (Hulu, three-episode binge)The docuseries exposes the life and crimes of Larry Rudolph, an audacious dentist and big game hunter forced to choose between his wife of 34 years and his longtime mistress. 📺 9 am Mickey Mouse Clubhouse+ (Disney Junior)The Mickey Mouse Clubhouse revival continues the adventures of Mickey and pals, and introduces Little Helper, a handy helping friend, and Duffy the Disney Bear, Mickey’s trusted teddy. (All 10 episodes will stream on Disney+ Tuesday.) 🦈 8 pm Great White Sex Battle (Discovery Channel special)Male and female great white sharks compete in a series of challenges to determine which sex is the superior predator. 🦈 9 pm Jaws vs. Mega Croc (Discovery Channel special)Using data gathered in new experiments, experts construct a CGI fight to the death between two of the biggest and baddest apex predators in the water. 📺 9 pm Super Mega Cakes Season 1 finale (Food Network) 🦈 10 pm In the Eye of the Storm: Shark Storm (Discovery Channel special)In the summer of 2024, dozens of cameras capture a rare outbreak of shark attacks along America’s gulf coast.  TUESDAY, JULY 22 📺 Hip Hop Was Born Here (Paramount+, five-episode binge)The docuseries will follow LL COOL J as he travels through hip hop history, highlighting the most important songs, performers and cultural influences that shaped the genre into the sensation that it is today. 📺 Red Eye (Hulu, six-episode binge)A British man (Richard Armitage) gets caught up in an incident in Beijing and must go back to China to face his crimes. 🦈 8 pm Great White Northern Invasion (Discovery Channel special)A team of scientists tracks down and tags the biggest sharks to uncover the sharkiest locations before there’s a fatal attack.     🦈 9 pm How to Survive a Shark Attack (Discovery Channel special)Shark attack survivor Paul de Gelder attempts the unthinkable – getting attacked by a shark, again.  📺 9 pm Caught in the Act: Double Life Season 1 finale (MTV)📺 9 pm Renaissance: The Blood and the Beauty docuseries finale (PBS)📺 9 pm Renovation Resort Showdown Season 2 (HGTV)📺 9:30 pm Beyond Skinwalker Ranch Season 3 finale (History) 🦈 10 pm Black Mako of the Abyss (Discovery Channel special)A group of experts lure the beast up from the abyss to determine if the creature is a mako, a mutant — or possibly, a mako and great white hybrid.  📺 10 pm Welcome to Plathville Season 7 (TLC) WEDNESDAY, JULY 23 📺 Acapulco final season (Apple TV+, two-episode premiere)📺 Building the Band Season 1 finale (Netflix, three episodes) 📺 Critical: Between Life and Death (Netflix, six-episode binge)From critical emergencies to the operating room, this docuseries follows London’s trauma units as they treat the most severely injured. 📺 Shiny Happy People Season 2 (Prime Video, four-episode binge)📺 Stick Season 1 finale (Apple TV+) 📺 Washington Black (Hulu, eight-episode binge)Sterling K. Brown and Tom Ellis have supporting roles in this 19th Century tale of an 11-year-old boy born on a Barbados sugar plantation whose prodigious scientific mind sets him on a path of unexpected destiny. 🦈 8 pm Expedition Unknown: Shark Files (Discovery Channel special)Global adventurer Josh Gates solves some of the strangest and most disturbing shark mysteries of all-time, including the real-life bloody inspiration for the movie Jaws.  📺 8 pm Family Law Season 4 (The CW)📺 8 pm Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Season 4 (ABC, next day on Hulu) 🦈 9 pm Expedition X: Malpelo Monster Shark (Discovery Channel special)Josh Gates sends Phil Torres and Heather Amaro on their most perilous mission yet: tracking a legendary monster shark that lurks in the eerie waters of Malpelo Island, 300 miles off Colombia’s coast.  📺 9 pm Holmes Family Rescue Season 3 finale (HGTV)📺 9 pm Match Game Season 6 (ABC, next day on Hulu) 🦈 10 pm Alien Sharks: Death Down Under (Discovery Channel special)Wildlife biologist Forrest Galante injects himself with shark venom to discover the potency of the venomous Port Jackson Shark and Ghost Shark. 📺 10 pm My Strange Arrest Season 3 (A&E)📺 10 pm South Park Season 27 (Comedy Central)📺 10:30 pm Digman! Season 2 (Comedy Central) THURSDAY, JULY 24 📺 All the Queen’s Men Season 4B (BET+, two-episode premiere)📺 Divorced Sistas midseason finale (BET+) 📺 Hitmakers (Netflix, eight-episode binge)Creativity and ego collide in this all-access reality series that follows a group of gifted songwriters as they pen hits for music’s biggest stars. 📺 The Sandman Season 2, Volume 2 (Netflix, five-episode binge) 📺 8 pm Code of Silence (BritBox, two-episode premiere)A deaf canteen worker (Rose Ayling-Ellis) becomes entangled in covert police work. 🦈 8 pm Surviving Jaws (Discovery Channel special)Marine biologist Tom “Blowfish” Hird and predator ecologist Michelle Jewell reexamine Jaws and dive with Great Whites to separate fact from fiction. 🦈 9 pm Caught! But when 5,000 Trevally fight back, the hunters become the hunted. 🎥 8 pm Before Your Father Finds Us (Lifetime movie)A woman (Alexa PenaVega) must draw on her faith to hide her and her teen daughter from her violent ex-husband. What are you watching this week? Take stock of everything above, then drop a comment with your lists below. Best Streaming Deals This Month
html:
To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025.

This week, you’ll find 10 series premieres (including The Hunting Wives and Washington Black), a dozen returning series (including Acapulco and South Park) and a dozen finales (including Patience and Stick).

Want scoop on any of the following shows? Email us and your question may be answered in Matt’s Inside Line.

SUNDAY, JULY 20

🦈 8 pm Dancing With Sharks (Discovery Channel special)
Five divers compete to put together an amazing underwater routine with their toothy partners; Tom Bergeron hosts.

📺 8 pm Patience Season 1 finale (PBS)

🦈 9 pm Air Jaws: The Hunt for Colossus (Discovery Channel special)
A 20-foot great white breaches in New Zealand, sparking a hunt for Colossus – the legendary flying shark who went missing 10 years ago from South Africa’s waters. 

🦈 10 pm Great White Assassins (Discovery Channel special)
Shark expert Alison Towner teams up with Shark Week legend Dickie Chivell to decode how killer whales take down great whites with ease. 

MONDAY, JULY 21

📺 The Hunting Wives (Netflix, eight-episode binge)
An East Coast transplant (Brittany Snow) is charmed by an East Texas socialite (Malin Åkerman), and soon finds her life consumed by obsession, seduction and murder; Chrissy Metz, Katie Lowes and Dermot Mulroney co-star.

📺 Justice on Trial (Prime Video, eight-episode binge)
Judge Judy Sheindlin puts the justice system on trial, and shows how the daily lives of 340 million Americans are impacted by the verdicts in the eight landmark cases.

📺 Trophy Wife: Murder on Safari (Hulu, three-episode binge)
The docuseries exposes the life and crimes of Larry Rudolph, an audacious dentist and big game hunter forced to choose between his wife of 34 years and his longtime mistress.

📺 9 am Mickey Mouse Clubhouse+ (Disney Junior)
The Mickey Mouse Clubhouse revival continues the adventures of Mickey and pals, and introduces Little Helper, a handy helping friend, and Duffy the Disney Bear, Mickey’s trusted teddy. (All 10 episodes will stream on Disney+ Tuesday.)

🦈 8 pm Great White Sex Battle (Discovery Channel special)
Male and female great white sharks compete in a series of challenges to determine which sex is the superior predator.

🦈 9 pm Jaws vs. Mega Croc (Discovery Channel special)
Using data gathered in new experiments, experts construct a CGI fight to the death between two of the biggest and baddest apex predators in the water.

📺 9 pm Super Mega Cakes Season 1 finale (Food Network)

🦈 10 pm In the Eye of the Storm: Shark Storm (Discovery Channel special)
In the summer of 2024, dozens of cameras capture a rare outbreak of shark attacks along America’s gulf coast. 

TUESDAY, JULY 22

📺 Hip Hop Was Born Here (Paramount+, five-episode binge)
The docuseries will follow LL COOL J as he travels through hip hop history, highlighting the most important songs, performers and cultural influences that shaped the genre into the sensation that it is today.

📺 Red Eye (Hulu, six-episode binge)
A British man (Richard Armitage) gets caught up in an incident in Beijing and must go back to China to face his crimes.

🦈 8 pm Great White Northern Invasion (Discovery Channel special)
A team of scientists tracks down and tags the biggest sharks to uncover the sharkiest locations before there’s a fatal attack.    

🦈 9 pm How to Survive a Shark Attack (Discovery Channel special)
Shark attack survivor Paul de Gelder attempts the unthinkable – getting attacked by a shark, again. 

📺 9 pm Caught in the Act: Double Life Season 1 finale (MTV)
📺 9 pm Renaissance: The Blood and the Beauty docuseries finale (PBS)
📺 9 pm Renovation Resort Showdown Season 2 (HGTV)
📺 9:30 pm Beyond Skinwalker Ranch Season 3 finale (History)

🦈 10 pm Black Mako of the Abyss (Discovery Channel special)
A group of experts lure the beast up from the abyss to determine if the creature is a mako, a mutant — or possibly, a mako and great white hybrid. 

📺 10 pm Welcome to Plathville Season 7 (TLC)

WEDNESDAY, JULY 23

📺 Acapulco final season (Apple TV+, two-episode premiere)
📺 Building the Band Season 1 finale (Netflix, three episodes)

📺 Critical: Between Life and Death (Netflix, six-episode binge)
From critical emergencies to the operating room, this docuseries follows London’s trauma units as they treat the most severely injured.

📺 Shiny Happy People Season 2 (Prime Video, four-episode binge)
📺 Stick Season 1 finale (Apple TV+)

📺 Washington Black (Hulu, eight-episode binge)
Sterling K. Brown and Tom Ellis have supporting roles in this 19th Century tale of an 11-year-old boy born on a Barbados sugar plantation whose prodigious scientific mind sets him on a path of unexpected destiny.

🦈 8 pm Expedition Unknown: Shark Files (Discovery Channel special)
Global adventurer Josh Gates solves some of the strangest and most disturbing shark mysteries of all-time, including the real-life bloody inspiration for the movie Jaws. 

📺 8 pm Family Law Season 4 (The CW)
📺 8 pm Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Season 4 (ABC, next day on Hulu)

🦈 9 pm Expedition X: Malpelo Monster Shark (Discovery Channel special)
Josh Gates sends Phil Torres and Heather Amaro on their most perilous mission yet: tracking a legendary monster shark that lurks in the eerie waters of Malpelo Island, 300 miles off Colombia’s coast. 

📺 9 pm Holmes Family Rescue Season 3 finale (HGTV)
📺 9 pm Match Game Season 6 (ABC, next day on Hulu)

🦈 10 pm Alien Sharks: Death Down Under (Discovery Channel special)
Wildlife biologist Forrest Galante injects himself with shark venom to discover the potency of the venomous Port Jackson Shark and Ghost Shark. 

📺 10 pm My Strange Arrest Season 3 (A&E)
📺 10 pm South Park Season 27 (Comedy Central)
📺 10:30 pm Digman! Season 2 (Comedy Central)

THURSDAY, JULY 24

📺 All the Queen’s Men Season 4B (BET+, two-episode premiere)
📺 Divorced Sistas midseason finale (BET+)

📺 Hitmakers (Netflix, eight-episode binge)
Creativity and ego collide in this all-access reality series that follows a group of gifted songwriters as they pen hits for music’s biggest stars.

📺 The Sandman Season 2, Volume 2 (Netflix, five-episode binge)

📺 8 pm Code of Silence (BritBox, two-episode premiere)
A deaf canteen worker (Rose Ayling-Ellis) becomes entangled in covert police work.

🦈 8 pm Surviving Jaws (Discovery Channel special)
Marine biologist Tom “Blowfish” Hird and predator ecologist Michelle Jewell reexamine Jaws and dive with Great Whites to separate fact from fiction.

🦈 9 pm Caught! Sharks Strike Back (Discovery Channel special)
Captured-on-camera moments include a shark slapping a fisherman in the face and an intense 10-minutes where in a great white stalked a kayaker.

🦈 10 pm Frankenshark (Discovery Channel special)
Shark expert Tristan Guttridge and his team use CGI to create the ultimate apex predator. 

FRIDAY, JULY 25

📺 Solo Traveling With Tracee Ellis Ross (The Roku Channel, three-episode binge)
The black-ish star is packing her bags and inviting audiences to join her on her trips to Morocco, Mexico, and Spain to experience the joy of solo travel. 

📺 8 pm Billy Joel: And So It Goes docuseries finale (HBO)

🦈 8 pm Great White Reign of Terror (Discovery Channel special)
Ryan Johnson, Gibbs Kuguru and Andy Casagrande head out to investigate the cause behind a spike in attacks near the Eastern cape of South Africa.

📺 8 pm Mama June: From Not to Hot Season 7 finale (WE tv)
📺 9 pm Border Security: Australia’s Front Line Season 16 (NatGeo)

🦈 9 pm Florida’s Death Beach (Discovery Channel special)
Forrest Galante and his team investigate why a popular spring break party beach has become so deadly before even more blood ends up in the water.

🦈 10 pm Bull Shark Showdown (Discovery Channel special)
The most vicious and insane populations of bull sharks from Australia and America face off in a no-holds-barred showdown beneath the water.

🎥 Death of a Unicorn (Max)

🎥 Happy Gilmore 2 (Netflix movie)
Adam Sandler reprises his role as the titular golf star.

🎥 The Phoenician Scheme (Peacock)

SATURDAY, JULY 26

🦈 8 pm Attack of the Devil Shark (Discovery Channel special)
Locals fear a pair of deadly shark attacks could be the work of a massive and ruthless tiger shark who has haunted their shores for decades.

📺 8 pm Two for One Season 2 finale (TCM)

🦈 9 pm Battle for Shark Mountain (Discovery Channel special)
Off Mozambique’s coast, sharks swarm a hidden peak, hunting Giant Trevally in a once-a-year feeding frenzy. But when 5,000 Trevally fight back, the hunters become the hunted.

🎥 8 pm Before Your Father Finds Us (Lifetime movie)
A woman (Alexa PenaVega) must draw on her faith to hide her and her teen daughter from her violent ex-husband.

What are you watching this week? Take stock of everything above, then drop a comment with your lists below.

Best Streaming Deals This Month
